value.stringValue: The AccInvoked_Account_Record_Type-2 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke AccInvoked_Account_Record_Type-2, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The AccInvoked_Account_Record_Type-2 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke AccInvoked_Account_Record_Type-2, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

Flow.description: Sets Account Record Type based on the account type
Flow.label: AccInvoked: Account Record Type
